Suite.Title: Stack Exchange

RestConnector.Title: Questions - Search Advanced
RestConnector.HelpText: Searches a site for any questions which fit the given criteria.

Text.Title: Site
Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

Text.Title: Query (Searches all Fields)
Text.HelpText: A free form text parameter, will match all question properties based on an undocumented algorithm.

Text.Title: Contains URL (Supports Wildcards *)
Text.HelpText: A url which must be contained in a post, may include a wildcard.

Text.Title: Body Contains Text
Text.HelpText: Text which must appear in returned questions' bodies.

Text.Title: Title Contains Text
Text.HelpText: Text which must appear in returned questions' titles.

Text.Title: Asked by Owner Id
Text.HelpText: The id of the user who must own the questions returned.

Number.Title: Min Answer Count
Number.HelpText: The minimum number of answers returned questions must have.

Number.Title: Min View Count
Number.HelpText: The minimum number of views returned questions must have.

Fetch.Fetch.Url: https://api.stackexchange.com/2.2/search/advanced?access_token=@(Model.Authenticator.Token)&key=OvqHAhlnGYqFCHK0B1hm9w((&site=@(Model.Site) &q=@Utils.UrlEncode(Model.Query) @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.UrlContains) ? "&url=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.UrlContains) : "") @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.BodyContains) ? "&body=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.BodyContains) : "") @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.TitleContains) ? "&title=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.TitleContains) : "") @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.OwnerFilter) ? "&user=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.OwnerFilter) : "") @(Model.AcceptedStatus != "all" ? "&accepted=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.AcceptedStatus) : "") @(Model.QuestionStatus != "all" ? "&closed=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.QuestionStatus) : "") @(Model.MinAnswerCount != 0 ? "&answers=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.MinAnswerCount) : "") @(Model.MinViewCount != 0 ? "&views=" + Utils.UrlEncode(Model.MinViewCount) : "") @if(Model.DateInterval.StartDate != null && Model.DateInterval.EndDate != null) { @: &fromdate=@(((DateTime)Model.DateInterval.StartDate).UnixTimeStampUtc()) @: &todate=@(((DateTime)Model.DateInterval.EndDate).UnixTimeStampUtc()) } &sort=@(Model.Sorting) &pagesize=@(Model.PageCursor.PageSize) &page=@(Model.PageCursor.Page+1)

RestConnector.Title: Questions - Search Similar
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns questions which are similar to a hypothetical one based on title.

Text.Title: Site
Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

RestConnector.Title: Questions - From Answers
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns the questions that answers identied by ids are on.

Text.Title: Site
Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

Text.Title: Answer Ids
Text.HelpText: Ids separated by newline

RestConnector.Title: Questions - Lookup
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns the questions identified in ids.

Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

Text.Title: Question Ids
Text.HelpText: Ids separated by newline

RestConnector.Title: Questions - Linked to Questions
RestConnector.HelpText: Gets questions which link to those questions identified in ids.

Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

RestConnector.HelpText: Returns questions that the site considers related to those identified in ids.

Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

RestConnector.HelpText: Returns all the questions with active bounties in the system.

Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

RestConnector.HelpText: Gets the questions asked by the users in ids.

Text.HelpText: Selects a specific site in the Stack Exchange network.

Text.Title: User Ids
Text.HelpText: Up to 100 Ids separated by newline

RestConnector.HelpText: Returns the questions owned by the current user.
